name: MAD's Apps Repo
subtitle: MrAlucardDante's Altstore repo with modified bundleId

apps.name: YoutubePlus
apps.subtitle: YouTubePlus: YouTube enhancement providing no ads, background playback, customizable navigation and tab bars; includes Advanced mode with over 50 additional options for enhanced customization.
apps.localizedDescription:
YouTubePlus: YouTube enhancement providing no ads, background playback, customizable navigation and tab bars; includes Advanced mode with over 50 additional options for enhanced customization.
iSponsorBlock: Skips annoying sponsor ads inside videos. iSponsorBlock is based on SponsorBlock engine. Basically, this is the iOS version of the SponsorBlock extension.
YouPiP: Enable YouTube’s native PiP. More options are in YouTube Settings => General.
YTUHD: Unlock VP9 codec and in effect, enables video quality of 2K and 4K. You can configure YTUHD in YouTube’s Settings - Video quality preferences.
YouTube Dislike Return: Brings back Dislike counts under YouTube videos using ReturnYoutubeDislike’s API.

versions.localizedDescription:
